main event: A 9-year-old boy observed a multi-colored light object moving in the northeast direction in Portland, Maine in 1968.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 2-10 minutes., The observer's mother expressed doubt about the reliability of his report., The object was described to be moving up and down., The report is categorized as 'Unreliable' due to the observer's young age., The sighting occurred in an urban area which had little corroborating evidence.
